org.dei.whynot

Class WhyNot

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dei.whynot.WhyNot

  • public class WhyNot
extends java.lang.Object
    WhyNot class implements the singleton pattern to ensure the creation of an unique instance. Used to build whynot explanations in text format

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
